info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pondera and north central Teton Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 229 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Choteau, moving north northeast 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conrad, Pendroy and Bynum. This includes Highway 89 between mile markers 51 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for north central Montana.
